alert.note: Alert for Adams (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 8:41PM CDT until July 28 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 PM CDT FOR ADAMS COUNTY... At 840 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near New Rome to Friendship to 8 miles north of Reedsburg, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Emergency management reported trees down and power outages near Necedah and Mauston. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. These severe thunderstorms will remain over mainly rural areas of Adams County, including the following locations... County Roads B And P, County Roads B And K, The Town Of Quincy, Highways 13 And 21, County Roads G And O, County Roads G And M and Big Spring. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
